bug.author: katzenbaer
bug.summary: TensorFlow for Poets: Section 5: label_image.py on site is different than curl version
bug.description:
Link: <denchmark-link:https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/index.html?index=..%2F..%2Findex#4>https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflow-for-poets/index.html?index=..%2F..%2Findex#4</denchmark-link>
On the site, the label_image.py script uses relative paths for files while the version the tutorial asks users to curl uses absolute paths for files. If the user is knowledgeable enough to prefer copying the script on the website vs. curl'ing it from <denchmark-link:https://goo.gl/tx3dqg>https://goo.gl/tx3dqg</denchmark-link> , then the user might run into an issue where they first need to run before being able to run the script as-is. <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1815591/23200175/c6512762-f887-11e6-9d7f-f031bd839ecd.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1815591/23200176/c6682af2-f887-11e6-82a2-75a0641a127d.png></denchmark-link>
